property.name: text
property.value: NOTE: The default assumes you have a broker server (e.g. mosquitto) running on 'localhost'. If you don't have a broker server, then try 'iot.eclipse.org' as the broker server address. It is an open and public broker server provided by the Paho project (https://eclipse.org/paho/).

property.name: text
property.value: Author: Hokeun Kim

property.name: text
property.value: A demo for JavaScript MQTT publisher / subscriber. The publisher publishes a message every second. The subscriber unsubscribes after the 7th message arrives.

property.name: expression
property.value: "Published message: " + count

property.name: script
note
property.value: NOTE: To see the script, invoke Open Actor

property.name: description
property.value:
Subscribe to MQTT protocol messages. MQTT is a lightweight messaging protocol. The brokerHost and brokerPort parameters specify the IP address and port of an MQTT broker, such as Mosquito. When a connection to the broker is established, a message will be produced on the connection output. To subscribe to a topic, provide the topic name to the subscribe input. If you send multiple topics to this input, it will subscribe to all the specified topics. To subscribe to all topics provided by the broker, give # as the topic name. To unsubscribe to a topic, provide the topics name to the unsubscribe input.

This accessor requires the 'mqtt' module.

property.name: author
property.value: Hokeun Kim, contributor: Christopher Brooks

property.name: subscribe (port)
property.value: The topic name to which to subscribe. Use # to subscribe to all topics.

property.name: unsubscribe (port)
property.value: A topic to unsubscribe from.

property.name: connection (port)
property.value: Output on which a string is sent when a connection to the broker has been established.

property.name: subscription (port)
property.value: Output on which a string is sent when a subscription is initiated or terminated.

property.name: received (port)
property.value: Output on which received data is produced.

property.name: receivedTopic (port)
property.value: Output indicating the topic of received data.

property.name: script
note
property.value: NOTE: To see the script, invoke Open Actor

property.name: description
property.value:
Publish MQTT protocol messages.

MQTT is a lightweight messaging protocol. This accessor requires the 'mqtt' module.

property.name: author
property.value: Hokeun Kim, contributor: Christopher Brooks

property.name: toPublish (port)
property.value: The data to be published.

property.name: connection (port)
property.value: Output on which a string is sent when a connection to the broker has been established.

property.name: topic (port)
property.value: Output indicating the topic of received data.
